full_summary:
NTC - EF236-222296: Aboriginal Development Enhancement for Archambault Institution
======================================
[Release Date - Date de publication: 2023-01-19]
[Submission Deadline - Date limite de soumission: 2023-03-10T14:00:00]

 Overview
---------

*   Tender Title: Aboriginal Development Enhancement for Archambault Institution
*   Solicitation Number: WS3821179422
*   Reference Number: WS3821179422-Doc3824373600
*   Amended: Yes (5th amendment)
*   Publication Date: 2023-01-19
*   Tender Closing Date: March 10, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST)

About the Project
----------------

*   Location: Archambault Institution, Sainte-Anne-Des-Plaines, Quebec, Canada
*   Project Description: The Canadian Government seeks a suitable contractor to develop facilities for Aboriginal groups at the Archambault Institution located in Sainte-Anne-Des-Plaines, Quebec.
*   Specification: Development of facilities for Aboriginal groups at the Archambault Institution as detailed in the RFP.

Who Should Apply
-----------------

*   Canadian contractors
*   Contractors who meet CFTA requirements

How to Submit
-------------

*   All required supporting documentation and submission should be made via Ariba (link: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15177459?extsite=MTUxNzc0NTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>).
*   Submission deadline: March 10, 2023 at 2:00 PM (EST).
*   Late submissions will be deemed non-responsive.

Contact Information
-----------------

*   Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Entity Address: 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5
*   Contact Person: Annabelle Cloutier (she/her) (annabelle.cloutier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Please Note
-----------

*   All RFP submission procedures must be followed.
*   Any outstanding or ignored items can lead to disqualification or denial of the application. Please review the RFP properly before filling out the bid submission.
